BldgEnrgyIntensity.name: BldgEnrgyIntensity
BldgEnrgyIntensity.description: Represents the average energy intensity by fuel type across a set of buildings. You can derive this data from published sources. Alternatively, you can do so by using energy use records as the data source and then setting up a window of time with some characteristics of the building size and type.

AnnualEnergyIntensityInKwhM2.description: The average energy consumption intensity for a year in kWh per square meter. The fuel-specific energy consumption intensities are stored in the associated building energy intensity value records.

AnnualEnergyIntensityInKwhSqft.description: The average energy consumption intensity for a year in kWh per square foot. The fuel-specific energy consumption intensities are stored in the associated building energy intensity value records.

AreSysGenEnrgyUseRecIncluded.description: "Indicates whether to include records created when filling data gaps (true) or not (false). Note: Including these records could result in inaccurate calculations."

AveragingWindowEndDate.description: The date until when the energy use records are considered to calculate the building energy intensity.

AveragingWindowStartDate.description: The date from when the energy use records are considered to calculate the building energy intensity.

BldgEnergyIntensityIdentifier.description: The unique external identifier for the building energy intensity record.

BuildingAssetType.description: The stationary asset type of the asset for which the building energy intensity is calculated.

BuildingSizeCategoryId.description: The building size category record for the stationary asset. You can add appropriate building size ranges by creating or editing building size category records.

BusinessRegion.description: The business region. If you select the business region, you can't select the country and state.

Country.description: The name of the country. You can enter a country only when you don’t select the business region.

EmissionFactorDataSource.description: The source of the emissions factor reference data.

EmissionFactorUpdateYear.description: The year when the emissions factor reference data was last updated by a publishing authority.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier for the emissions factor.

IsRecordLocked.description: Indicates that the record is locked for editing.

LastCalculatedDate.description: The date and time when the record was most recently calculated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MaximumBuildingSizeInM2.description: The maximum size of the building in square meters. This value is used to calculate building energy intensity.

MaximumBuildingSizeInSqft.description: The maximum size of the building in square feet. This value is used to calculate building energy intensity.

MinimumBuildingSizeInM2.description: The minimum size of the building in square meters. This value is used to calculate building energy intensity.

MinimumBuildingSizeInSqft.description: The minimum size of the building in square meters. This value is used to calculate building energy intensity.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ReferenceDataLoadLogId.description: The reference data load log record that's associated with the emissions factor.

RegionalDivision.description: The regional division for this building energy intensity record.

ShouldLockDtastUpdtForRec.description: Indicates whether the emissions factor record can be locked from dataset updates.

State.description: The name of the state. You can enter a state only when you don’t select the business region and don’t enter multiple countries.
